page.title: 13Playground games
page.content: {Marbles-}A marble is a small glass ball.You must find a marble and a drainpipe.You throw your marble and try to get it up the pipe."No brings" means you have to jump back twice ,and "brings" means you have to jump forward twice."Little finger" means you have to aim with your little finger,and "little finger flicks" means shoot with a flick of your little finger."Force to aim" means you have to aim at the pipe, "force to aim away" means do not aim at the pipe.You can get all kinds of marbles.Spider dobbies are white with stripes in the middle.
